title: Tense situation near SLFP headquarters
body_lines: A tense situation is reported in front of the headquarters of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP) in Colombo.
It ensued after former President and SLFP’s chairman Maithripala Sirisena arrived at the headquarters.
SLFP general secretary, MP Dayasiri Jayasekara was seen speaking with the protesters, in an attempt to bring the situation under control.
